title: No poro icon
body:
I have received the Kayle skin, but have yet to get the icon :C
Wondering if I can get any help with it?

replies.body:
We're sending the icons out in waves just to make sure they get out alright. 

Let me know if you don't have it by the 23rd, as *Lew* mentioned.
Riot please, Make sure my icon comes home safe.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZUcog6lj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-21T23:59:43.327+0000)
>
> We're sending the icons out in waves just to make sure they get out alright. 
> 
> Let me know if you don't have it by the 23rd, as *Lew* mentioned.

honestly, you were so unprepared for this "event" as a billion dollar company, you should be ashamed. still no icon here also.
